text: Bahman Mofid (; 15 August 1942 â€“ 16 August 2020) was an Iranian actor and singer. He was born in Tehran. He was known for his roles in Qeysar, Reza Motorcyclist and Wood Pigeon. Mofid died of lung cancer in Tehran on 16 August 2020, one day after his 78th birthday.Bahman Mofid dies at 78 ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Iranian singers Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Actors from Tehran
title: Bahman Mofid
